sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNCNTCINFO ( CNTC_INFO_ID ,CNTC_NM ,PROVD_INSTT ,CTTPC ,CNTC_BEGIN_DE ,CNTC_END_DE ,USE_AT ,CNTC_INFO_DC ,FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #cntcInfoId# , #cntcNm# , #provdInstt# , #cttpc# ,REPLACE(#cntcBeginDe#,'-','') ,REPLACE(#cntcEndDe#,'-','') , #useAt# ,#cntcInfoDc# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE ,#frstRegisterId#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNCNTCINFO SET CNTC_INFO_ID=#cntcInfoId# ,CNTC_NM=#cntcNm# ,PROVD_INSTT = #provdInstt# ,CTTPC = #cttpc# ,CNTC_BEGIN_DE =REPLACE(#cntcBeginDe#,'-','') ,CNTC_END_DE = REPLACE(#cntcEndDe#,'-','') ,CNTC_INFO_DC = #cntcInfoDc# ,USE_AT=#useAt# ,LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = SYSDATE ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE CNTC_INFO_ID=#cntcInfoId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CNTC_INFO_ID cntcInfoId ,CNTC_NM cntcNm ,PROVD_INSTT provdInstt ,CTTPC cttpc ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNTC_BEGIN_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') cntcBeginDe ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNTC_END_DE, 'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') cntcEndDe ,CNTC_INFO_DC cntcInfoDc ,USE_AT useAt FROM OE1TNCNTCINFO WHERE CNTC_INFO_ID=#cntcInfoId#

CNTC_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
